nodes.text: Jabba Desilijic Tiure's will was the last will and testament of Jabba the Hutt. After Jabba's death, other Hutts had "endless debates" about the will, leading to them going through the wreckage of the Khetanna in order to determine the nature of Jabba's death. They found a hologram of the rescue of Han Solo, which was "traded in only the most exclusive circles" over the next few decades.

Jabba Desilijic Tiure's will was first mentioned in Star Wars canon in Claudia Gray's 2016 novel Bloodline. It was originally created by Hollace and Paul Davids for the 1992 book Zorba the Hutt's Revenge.
